p: ONNV-infected joints developed a mild, yet visible joint swelling around the metatarsal region that peaked on 6 dpi ( Figures 1B,C). Importantly, peak joint swelling was significantly more pronounced for the 3WO group ( Figures 1B,C). Together, the results show that the 3WO C57BL/6J mouse is a good immune-competent pre-clinical model for ONNV as it recapitulates most of the clinical symptoms.
